column2: Elessar]] of the [[Reunited Kingdom]] of [[Gondor]] and [[Arnor]]. [[Eldarion]], son of Elessar and [[Arwen]], becomes King.<ref name="Later">{{App

column1: * It is said that the beds of [[Meriadoc Brandybuck
column3: Peregrin]] were set beside the bed of the great king.<ref name="Later"/>

column1: * [[Legolas]] builds a grey ship in [[Ithilien]], and with [[Gimli]] sails down [[Anduin]] and so over [[Belegaer
column2: Sea]]. This marks the end in [[Middle-earth]] of the [[Fellowship of the Ring]].<ref name="Later"/>
